title: Group portrait of groom, wearing moustache, and military uniform with Airman First Class patch on right shoulder, standing with  bride, wearing veil, earrings, two strand necklace, light colored wedding dress with scalloped collar, sheer shoulders, lace sleeves, and skirt with floral embroidery, holding bouquet with large light colored ribbon in left arm, posed standing on altar of church with plants and cross with plaque on left, possibly for Stunt wedding in Central Baptist Church
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
